UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL for the user's profile picture.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate if the user is an administrator.

isTechLead.description: Flag to indicate if the user is a tech lead.

teamId.description: The ID of the team the user belongs to.

techLeadId.description: The UID of the user who is the tech lead of this team.

availableServiceIds.description: List of service IDs that members of this team can request.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a service or access that can be requested.

description.description: A brief description of the service.

AccessRequest.title: Access Request
AccessRequest.description: Represents a user's request for a service.

userId.description: The UID of the user making the request.

serviceId.description: The ID of the service being requested.

status.description: The current status of the request.

requestedAt.description: The timestamp when the request was made.

resolvedAt.description: The timestamp when the request was resolved.

resolvedBy.description: The UID of the admin or tech lead who resolved the request.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/requests/{requestId}.description: Collection of all access requests from users.
